2025-08-21.content: You can now use a Google-managed certificate when you create a [create a Private Service Connect Secure Source Manager instance](https://cloud.google.com/secure-source-manager/docs/create-private-service-connect-instance#create-private-service-connect-instance).

summary.title: New feature: Google-managed certificates for Private Service Connect
summary.summary: Use a Google-managed certificate for Private Service Connect Secure Source Manager instances.

2025-08-14.content: Integrated data loss prevention (DLP) is now [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)

summary.title: Data Loss Prevention Now Available
summary.summary: Integrated data loss prevention is now generally available.

2025-08-04.content: Secure Source Manager is now [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) for all customers.

summary.title: Secure Source Manager now available
summary.summary: Secure Source Manager is now available for all customers.

2025-07-08.content:
Secure Source Manager is now available in the following [regions](https://cloud.google.com/secure-source-manager/docs/locations#regions):

* australia-southeast1 (Sydney)
* asia-northeast1 (Tokyo)

summary.title: Secure Source Manager now in more available
summary.summary: Secure Source Manager is now available in australia-southeast1 (Sydney) and asia-northeast1 (Tokyo).
